scenes.background: You assure Monica that you'll tackle the report after the presentation.
scenes.description: [Bob] sighs and says, 'This is getting complicated. How do you propose we wrap this up quickly?'

options.text: Let's divide the remaining tasks equally and push through together.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy by suggesting a fair division of labor, but motivation might be affected by the workload.

options.text: We should focus on one task at a time. Let's finish the presentation first.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and emotional perception by prioritizing tasks, but empathy might be seen as lacking by not considering others' workloads.

options.text: Maybe we should re-evaluate our priorities and see if we can delegate some tasks.
options.analysis: You show good social skills by suggesting delegation, but emotional perception and self-regulation could be better as it might delay progress.
